sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label, Multi-Center Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of Intramuscular Ziprasidone In Patients With Agitation
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open Label, Rater Blind, Flexible Dose Multi-Center Study Comparing The Efficacy And Safety Of Intramuscular Ziprasidone With Haloperidol For Three Days In Patients With Agitation Of Schizophrenia
summary: This local registration study is to confirm the hypothesis of the efficacy, tolerability and safety of ziprasidone IM (intramuscular) in the Chinese population with agitation in schizophrenia

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Brief Psychiatric Rating Scale (BPRS) Total Scores at 72 Hours
